property.name: Unplaced units live when not placed
notes
property.value:
Winter War
Designed by mglmosaic

Version:0.5

November 30th 1939
With the signing of the Molotov-Ribbentrop pact, Finland is left to fend off the Red Giant alone
Its army fully mobilized the finns have dug in and are ready for a fight
Can they hold out long enough for world oppinion to force an end to this war? Or will once again they become a simple province of a Greater Soviet Empire



Win conditions are as follows:
Finns have 15 time units at the start of their turn
Lenningrad is controlled by finns at the start of their turn
USSR Controls 11 victory cities at the start of their turn

OR Somebody gives up


Game uses 8 sided die

Land Units
Unit name att def move cost size special abilities
Armour 4 2 2 X 3 canBlitz
Artillery 2 3 1 X 3 givesSupport
Elite 7 7 1 X 2 isSupportable
Fort 0 6 0 X X 2 Hit
Infantry 1 4 1 X 2 isSupportable
Forest 0 0 0 X X 2 Hit
Conscript 1 1 1 X 2 isSupportable
Time 0 0 0 3 X Marks time limit
Factory 0 0 0 X X isFactory
Unit name att def move cost size special abilities

Finns get 1 conscript for every 5 territories
USSR gets an infantry for every 3 territories, an arty for every 5, armour for every 10
Air Units
Unit name att def move cost special abilities
Fighter 2 3 3 X
Bomber 4 1 5 X
Unit name att def move cost special abilities

Air Units are not purchasable USSR gets 1 fighter for every 15 territories
Naval Units
Unit name att def move cost special abilities
Transport 0 0 1 X Transport up to 5 in size
Destroyer 2 2 1 X
Cruiser 3 3 1 X
Battleship 4 4 1 X 2 Hit
Unit name att def move cost special abilities

Sea Units are not purchasable, what you start with is what you get Battleships do not recover
